author: team@zerobias.org

availableClientLibraries.name: octokit
availableClientLibraries.notes: Official GitHub SDK with full REST and GraphQL API support, TypeScript declarations, and comprehensive GitHub platform coverage

availableClientLibraries.name: @octokit/rest
availableClientLibraries.notes: Dedicated REST API client, part of Octokit ecosystem

availableClientLibraries.name: axios
availableClientLibraries.notes: General-purpose HTTP client, requires manual endpoint construction for GitHub API

listEnterprises.body: query { enterprises(first: 100) { nodes { id name slug description } } }
listEnterprises.notes: Lists enterprises - only available via GraphQL API, requires enterprise access

getEnterprise.body: query($slug: String!) { enterprise(slug: $slug) { id name slug description organizationsTotalCount } }
getEnterprise.notes: Gets single enterprise by slug - GraphQL API only

listOrganizations.notes: Lists all public organizations, supports pagination with since parameter

listEnterpriseOrganizations.body: query($slug: String!, $first: Int!) { enterprise(slug: $slug) { organizations(first: $first) { nodes { id login name description } } } }
listEnterpriseOrganizations.notes: Lists organizations within an enterprise - GraphQL API only, requires enterprise access

listOrganizationMembers.notes: Lists public organization members, private members require organization membership

getUser.notes: Gets public user information by username

keyNotes: Enterprise operations require GraphQL API - REST API doesn't support enterprise organization listing
Enterprise access requires personal access token (classic) with appropriate enterprise permissions
Organization member visibility depends on organization privacy settings and user permissions
Rate limiting applies: 5000 requests/hour for authenticated requests, 60/hour for unauthenticated
Octokit library recommended for full GitHub API support including both REST and GraphQL
Some operations may require specific scopes or permissions (admin:org, read:org, etc.)
